head.citation-title: 3rd International Workshop on Advanced Computational Intelligence, IWACI 2010
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 133 papers. The topics discussed include: model of distributed control software based multi-agent system for large-scale laser experiment equipment; common fixed point under integral type contractive condition in fuzzy metric spaces; convergence of solutions to a class of mixed nonlinear variational inclusion for fuzzy mappings; mean shift-based clustering for directional data; a relevance feedback scheme based on hidden Markov model regression for 3D model retrieval; comparison of SFA and ICA; new gray-scale watermarking algorithm of color images based on quaternion Fourier transform; dynamic difficulty adjustment realization based on adaptive neuro-controlled game opponent; study of Gabor and local binary patterns for retinal image analysis; design of wireless sensor networks in prevention of combustion on coal gangue based on pseudo-parallel genetic algorithms; and a network weight-based multi-community discovery algorithm.
